verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of Samuel<WH8050> came<WH1961> to all<WH3605> Israel.<WH3478> Now Israel<WH3478> went out<WH3318> against<WH7125> the Philistines<WH6430> to battle,<WH4421> and pitched<WH2583> beside<WH5921> Ebenezer:<WH72> and the Philistines<WH6430> pitched<WH2583> in Aphek.<WH663>
